features.heading: Why Choose WaveSpeed AI for Captioning?
features.description: Our state-of-the-art technology delivers engaging captions that enhance your images effortlessly.

items.title: Instant Captions
items.description: Receive accurate captions in seconds, enhancing your images without delay.

items.title: User-Friendly
items.description: No prior experience needed. Just upload an image and let our AI do the rest!

items.title: Secure Processing
items.description: Your images remain private as everything is processed directly in your browser.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three easy steps to create captivating captions for your photos

items.title: Upload Your Image
items.description: Drag and drop or select your photo. Our service supports various formats including JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: AI Caption Generation
items.description: Our intelligent AI analyzes the image and generates rich, descriptive captions that capture the essence.

items.title: Download Your Captions
items.description: Review the AI-generated captions and easily download them alongside your images.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Hear from users who have transformed their photos with our captioning feature

items.name: Emily Carter
items.comment: The captions add so much depth and fun to my travel photos. A must-have for any trip!

items.name: Daniel Kim
items.comment: As a social media manager, this tool has saved me time and improved my posts significantly.

items.name: Laura Smith
items.comment: I love how accurate the captions are. It really makes sharing my images more engaging!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get the answers to your questions about AI Image Captioning

items.title: What types of images can be captioned?
items.description: Our AI can generate captions for a wide range of images, including landscapes, portraits, events, and much more, providing context that resonates with viewers.

items.title: Is there a limit to how many images I can caption?
items.description: Each user gets 30 caption credits daily, making it easy to caption numerous images. Additional credits can be earned through participation in our community.

items.title: Can I use AI-generated captions commercially?
items.description: Yes, users on any subscription plan can use the captions for commercial purposes. Free-tier users can utilize them for personal projects.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: Captions are generated directly in your browser, ensuring your images never leave your device and maintaining your privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Enhance Your Photos with Captions?
